name: Home EV Charging System Setup
description: Getting your home EV charging right from the start makes ownership hassle-free. Solomon Electric provides complete home EV charging system setup throughout South Florida—from initial planning through final installation. We assess your panel, plan the installation, recommend appropriate equipment, and install everything for reliable home charging.
warningSignsSubheading: Good planning ensures your charging setup works perfectly for your needs.

problems.title: Just Purchased an EV
problems.description: Congratulations! Now you need home charging. We help new EV owners plan and install the right charging setup for their situation.

problems.title: Overwhelmed by Options
problems.description: Outlet vs. hardwired? Level 1 vs. Level 2? Which brand? We explain options and help you choose what fits your needs and budget.

problems.title: Concerned About Panel Capacity
problems.description: Not sure if your panel can handle EV charging? We assess capacity and recommend solutions—from direct installation to panel upgrades.

problems.title: Want Smart Features
problems.description: Scheduling, energy monitoring, utility integration—smart chargers offer features that save money and add convenience.

problems.title: Planning Multi-EV Household
problems.description: If you have or will have multiple EVs, planning infrastructure now avoids redundant work later.

problems.title: Utility Rate Optimization
problems.description: FPL time-of-use rates mean charging timing matters. Smart charger setup maximizes savings from off-peak charging.

process.title: EV Charging Consultation
process.description: We discuss your EV, driving patterns, budget, and preferences to understand your ideal charging solution.

process.title: Site and Panel Assessment
process.description: We evaluate your electrical panel, determine capacity for EV charging, and plan installation approach.

process.title: Equipment Recommendation
process.description: Based on your needs, we recommend appropriate charging equipment—outlet, portable EVSE, or hardwired Level 2 charger.

process.title: Complete Installation
process.description: We install the complete charging system—circuit, wiring, charger or outlet, and any panel modifications needed.

process.title: Setup and Training
process.description: For smart chargers, we configure scheduling, connect to WiFi and apps, and explain features so you can maximize benefits.

benefits.title: Right Solution First Time
benefits.description: Expert guidance ensures you choose the charging solution that matches your actual needs—not under or over-specified.

benefits.title: Optimized Installation
benefits.description: We find the best route from panel to parking, minimize installation cost, and plan for potential future needs.

benefits.title: Utility Savings
benefits.description: Smart charger setup with time-of-use scheduling maximizes savings from FPL's lower overnight rates.

benefits.title: Future Ready
benefits.description: Even if you start simple, we plan infrastructure that accommodates upgrades—more EVs, higher power, or additional features.

faqs.question: I just ordered an EV—where do I start?
faqs.answer: Contact us for a consultation. We'll discuss your EV model, where you park, your panel situation, and your preferences. We'll recommend the right charging approach and can have it installed before your EV arrives.

faqs.question: What's the difference between Level 1 and Level 2 charging?
faqs.answer: Level 1 uses a standard 120V outlet—about 4 miles of range per hour (40 miles overnight). Level 2 uses 240V—about 25-30 miles per hour (full charge overnight for most EVs). Most homeowners want Level 2 for practical daily charging.

faqs.question: Do I need a specific charger for my EV brand?
faqs.answer: Most EVs use the standard J1772 connector that works with any Level 2 EVSE. Teslas come with an adapter or can use Universal Wall Connectors. We recommend equipment compatible with your specific vehicle.

faqs.question: Should I get a smart charger?
faqs.answer: Smart chargers offer valuable features: scheduled charging for off-peak rates, energy monitoring, remote control, and integration with utility programs. If you'll use these features, smart chargers pay for themselves in energy savings.

faqs.question: What if I have two EVs or might add another?
faqs.answer: We can plan for multiple EVs—either separate circuits for each parking spot or a shared circuit with power-sharing capability. Planning during initial installation is much more cost-effective than adding later.

faqs.question: How can I save money on EV charging?
faqs.answer: FPL offers time-of-use rates where overnight electricity costs less. Smart chargers can schedule charging during these hours automatically. We set up scheduling during installation so savings start immediately.

faqs.question: What if my panel is full or too small?
faqs.answer: Options include: panel upgrade for more capacity, tandem breakers for more circuits, load management devices that share capacity, or charging at lower power levels. We evaluate your situation and recommend the best approach.

faqs.question: How long does complete setup take?
faqs.answer: Simple installations often complete in one visit. If panel work is needed, it may be two visits. Panel upgrades add time. We provide realistic timelines when we assess your situation.

seoContent.heading: Home EV Charging System Setup in South Florida
seoContent.body: Getting your home EV charging right from the start makes ownership hassle-free. Solomon Electric provides complete home EV charging setup throughout Miami-Dade and Broward counties—from planning through installation to smart charger configuration.

seoContent.heading: Expert Guidance for New EV Owners
seoContent.body: Overwhelmed by charging options? We explain the choices—outlet vs. hardwired, Level 1 vs. Level 2, smart features vs. simple installation—and recommend what fits your needs and budget. No pressure, just expert advice.

seoContent.heading: Smart Charger Setup and Optimization
seoContent.body: Smart EV chargers save money through scheduled charging during FPL's lower overnight rates. We configure scheduling, connect apps, and set up features so you maximize savings from day one.

seoContent.heading: Complete Home EV Setup
seoContent.body: Solomon Electric provides complete home EV charging installation throughout Miami, Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood, and all surrounding communities. From consultation to installation to training—we handle everything for hassle-free home charging.
